
<!-- Generated by doc-generator on 2025-12-12 -->

---

## Props

### Content
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------|-------------|
| caption | any | 'Link' | No | Text content displayed in the anchor link |
| hyperlink | string | null | No | URL destination for the anchor link |
| encodeurl | boolean | false | No | Whether to URL-encode the hyperlink before navigation |
| target | string | '_blank' | No | Specifies where to open the linked document |
| nooflines | any | undefined | No | Maximum number of lines to display for the caption text |

### Icon Configuration
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------|-------------|
| iconclass | string | null | No | CSS class name for icon styling |
| iconposition | string | 'left' | No | Position of icon relative to caption text |
| iconurl | string | null | No | URL path to custom icon image |
| iconheight | number | null | No | Height dimension for the icon in pixels |
| iconwidth | number | null | No | Width dimension for the icon in pixels |
| iconmargin | number | null | No | Margin spacing around the icon in pixels |

### Layout
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------|-------------|
| width | string | null | No | Width of the anchor component |
| height | string | null | No | Height of the anchor component |

### Animation
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------|-------------|
| animation | string | null | No | CSS animation class to apply to the component |
| animationdelay | number | null | No | Delay before animation starts in milliseconds |

### Badge
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------|-------------|
| badgevalue | string | null | No | Text or number to display in a badge overlay |

### Interaction
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------|-------------|
| onTap | any | undefined | No | Callback function executed when the anchor is tapped |

### Loading States
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------|-------------|
| skeletonwidth | number | undefined | No | Width of skeleton loader placeholder |
| skeletonheight | number | undefined | No | Height of skeleton loader placeholder |

### Accessibility
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------|-------------|
| accessibilitylabel | string | undefined | No | Accessibility label for screen readers |
| hint | string | undefined | No | Accessibility hint providing usage guidance |
| accessibilityrole | AccessibilityRole | 'link' | No | Semantic role for accessibility services |

### Inherited Props
| Prop | Type | Default | Inherited From | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------------|-------------|
| id | string | null | BaseProps | Unique identifier for the component |
| name | string | null | BaseProps | Name attribute for the component |
| disabled | any | false | BaseProps | Whether the component is disabled and non-interactive |
| show | any | true | BaseProps | Controls visibility of the component |
| styles | any | null | BaseProps | Custom inline styles to apply |
| classname | string | null | BaseProps | Additional CSS class names |
| showindevice | ('xs'\|'sm'\|'md'\|'lg'\|'xl'\|'xxl')[] | null | BaseProps | Device breakpoints where component should be visible |
| showskeleton | boolean | undefined | BaseProps | Whether to display skeleton loading state |
| disabletoucheffect | boolean | false | BaseProps | Disables visual touch feedback effects |

## Methods

| Method | Parameters | Return Type | Description |
|--------|------------|-------------|-------------|
| onTap | navigationService: NavigationService, e: SyntheticEvent | void | Handles tap events and navigation logic |
| renderBadge | none | void | Renders the badge overlay if badgevalue is provided |

## Events

| Event | Parameters | Description |
|-------|------------|-------------|
| onTap | `e`, `this.proxy` | Fired when the anchor is tapped or clicked |
| onTouchstart | `e` | Fired when touch interaction begins |
| onDoubletap | `e` | Fired when the anchor is double-tapped |
| onLongtap | `e` | Fired when the anchor is pressed and held |
| onTouchend | `e` | Fired when touch interaction ends |

## Style Classes

### Default Styles
- `app-anchor` - Base styling for the anchor component
- `app-anchor-rtl` - Right-to-left text direction styling

### Color Variants
- `link-primary` - Primary theme color styling
- `link-secondary` - Secondary theme color styling
- `link-success` - Success state color (typically green)
- `link-danger` - Danger/error state color (typically red)
- `link-warning` - Warning state color (typically yellow/orange)
- `link-info` - Informational state color (typically blue)
- `link-light` - Light color variant
- `link-dark` - Dark color variant
